goals.complete: A white stag has been seen in the Verdence. Just like in my Dream! I must find out what this means.

goals.active: Search for the white stag in the Verdence.
goals.complete: Sylvari are spreading the tale of a white stag roaming the Caledon Forest. I dreamed of such a stag! He may be elusive, but I believe I can find him.

goals.active: Search for the white stag in the caverns.
goals.complete: While looking for the legendary white stag, I came upon a hunter named Gavin. I rescued him from trouble, and he offered to help with my quest.
